zone.name: The Tower in the Wastes (2 of 2)

rooms.name: The Hidden Basement
rooms.description: This room has but one exit, to the south.  A pair of magnificent silver doors leads deeper into the unknown.  The air is slightly cool, and fresh, which is a bit of a relief, since the lack of windows in the room does not allow discovery of where this room is actually located.

South.description: The doors to the south are both highly polished silver.  The doors have no visible handle, nor a keyhole.

rooms.name: A Pitch-Black Hallway
rooms.description: The hallway leads to another set of silver doors.  The ceiling is somewhat low, but tall enough for the room to be comfortably walked through.  The floor of the hall has had grooves carved into it, forming a chaotic, tessellated pattern.  Each division of the floor is highly polished, giving the facade of a tile floor.  The rest of the hall is essentially unornamented.  The walls are smooth but matte, giving a soft dark feel to the area.

South.description: A set of silver double doors, much like the ones to the north, adorn the exit to the south.

rooms.name: An Expansive Cavern
rooms.description: A rather wide cavern extends to the south of the silver double-doors to the north.  The cavern walls here are decorated in a bright blue, reflecting the light of the torches that line the eastern and western wall.  Though it is hard to make out detail the black rock ceiling and floor, overall the area is fairly well lit.  Side tunnels extend to the west and east, while a larger tunnel leads to the south.

North.description: A set of silver doors in the northern wall seperates this room from the entrance.

rooms.name: A Long Hallway
rooms.description: The tunnel opens into a hallway, with an arched ceiling.  The tunnel continues to the south, as far as is visible.  The walls are quite homogeneous black rock, as are the ceiling and floor.  Evenly spaced, hanging from the arched ceiling above, are brass lanterns, built into the ceiling.  The hallway continues to the south.

rooms.name: A Long Hallway
rooms.description: The hallway continues on as far as is visible to the south.  To the north, the end of the hallway is visible.  The hallway's walls are unornamented, and the homogeneous black rock makes looking at any particular chunk of rock just the same as looking at any other.

rooms.name: A Long Hallway
rooms.description: The hallway continues on as far as is visible to the south.  To the north, the end of the hallway is visible.  The hallway's walls are unornamented, and the homogeneous black rock makes looking at any particular chunk of rock just the same as looking at any other.

rooms.name: A Long Hallway
rooms.description: The hallway continues on as far as is visible to the south.  To the north, the end of the hallway is visible.  The hallway's walls are unornamented, and the homogeneous black rock makes looking at any particular chunk of rock just the same as looking at any other.

rooms.name: A Secret Closet
rooms.description: Behind the false wall is a small room with matte black walls.  The floor lacks the geometric pattern of the hallway outside, but the south wall has an emblem carved into it, faintly visible in the light.  The emblem depicts a large, half-human, half-dragon pawing at the moon.  On the opposite wall is an oak fork hanging from the wall, a holder for something.  The false wall leads back into the hallway to the west.

rooms.name: An Alcove
rooms.description: A large circumscribed pentagram stretches all the way from the north to the south wall of this alcove.  To the west, a wooden door leads into the unknown. The doorway has a hook on either side, allowing for a bar to be laid across, effectively locking it from this side.  A small tunnel to the east leads back to the main cavern.

West.description: A wooden door is set in the west wall, a wooden bar set across it to forestall forced entry

rooms.name: An Unfinished Cavern
rooms.description: An immense cavern expands to the south and west.  The walls of this cavern are rough and bumpy, in contrast to the smooth, polished stone that comprises the rest of the area.  No light sources are hung in the area, making the black rock seem even darker.  Occaisonally, a clicking sound seems to drift through the cavern.  Retreat lies to the east.

East.description: A wooden doorway leads to the east.

rooms.name: An Unfinished Cavern
rooms.description: To the south, the walls are once again smooth and polished.  A statue stands near the south wall, its head a large rectangular block yet to be carved out. The floor has been smoothed out, although not polished like the walls.  A single lantern hangs overhead, but is currently unlit.  The cavern extends to the north and west.

rooms.name: A Finished Corner of an Unfinished Cavern
rooms.description: This corner of the cavern is in a more finished state than the rest.  The walls here are smoothed out, and for the most part polished.  The floor here has been smoothed, and traces of white powder are reminiscent of the patterns carved into the floor outside.  The cavern continues to the east, into an unfinished section, and north into a partially complete region.

rooms.name: A Partially Finished Cavern
rooms.description: This corner of the cavern is partially finished.  The western wall has been smoothed out and polished, while the northern wall is in a much rougher state. To the west, a doorway has been carved into the wall, though only about an arms length deep.  A wooden door that looks as though it would fit in the doorway leans against the northern wall.  The cavern continues to the east and south.

rooms.name: The Marble Hallway
rooms.description: This hallway drastically changes from the room to the west, in that the hallway is lined with a white marble, streaked with bluish-black veins. Small, brass lanterns hang from the ceiling, giving a soft ambient glow to the hallway.  The hallway leads to a room to the east.

rooms.name: The Hidden Study
rooms.description: The hallway ends here in a study, lined with the same marble.  Along the north wall, a set of wooden shelves hold a variety of books, ranging from leatherbound books with gold lettering to barely bound parcels of paper.  A large desk has various papers scattered about, with various forms of writing scrawled across them.  Some of the lettering seems rather mundane, but some is quite arcane.  The hallway leads back to the east.

North.description: Part of the wall, in the shape of an arch, seems to flicker.  Perhaps it's illusionary?

rooms.name: Through The Arch
rooms.description: The illusionary wall lies semitransparant to the south, allowing a view of the study that lies through it.  The obvious nature of the false wall must have been designed to lure travellers in - the floor in this room is also false, being quite non-solid.

rooms.name: A Jail Cell
rooms.description: The black walls to the west, south, and east form a bleak jail cell, with a set of steel bars forming the last wall to the north.  The ceiling, oddly enough, seems to be made of marble.  Puddles of squalid water pool on the uneven surface of the floor, and the rest of the room seems quite dirty.  A barred steel door in the northern wall is the only potential exit.

extras.text: The ceiling seems fake in places, but prodding it, it is actually quite solid.

rooms.name: A Staircase
rooms.description: A simple stairway leads down to a lower floor here.  Each stair step is a plate of polished marble, but it looks as though the underlying foundation is black rock.  The bottom of the staircase is cloaked in darkness.  The main cavern lies through a small tunnel to the east.

rooms.name: Staircase Landing
rooms.description: This hallway bends from the east to the south.  The hall's black walls are rough and bumpy, and have no lantern or torchholders.  The air here is damp and somewhat warm, which makes the perfect environment for the red mold that grows all about.  The floor is mostly smoothed, but occasionally there are large protrusions, requiring care to avoid tripping.  A stairway leads back upwards, towards the light.

rooms.name: A Dark Hallway
rooms.description: This hallway runs from a stair landing to the west, to the east.  The hall's black walls are rough and bumpy, and have no lantern or torchholders.  The air here is damp and somewhat warm, which makes the perfect environment for the red mold that grows all about.  The floor is mostly smoothed, but occasionally there are large protrusions, requiring care to avoid tripping.

rooms.name: A Turn in the Dark Hallway
rooms.description: This hallway bends from the west to the south.  The hall's black walls are rough and bumpy, and have no lantern or torchholders.  The air here is damp and somewhat warm, which makes the perfect environment for the red mold that grows all about.  The floor is mostly smoothed, but occasionally there are large protrusions, requiring care to avoid tripping.

rooms.name: A Dark Hallway
rooms.description: This hallway runs from the north to the south.  The hall's black walls are rough and bumpy, and have no lantern or torchholders.  The air here is damp and somewhat warm, which makes the perfect environment for the red mold that grows all about.  The floor is mostly smoothed, but occasionally there are large protrusions, requiring care to avoid tripping.

East.description: A whitewashed wood door lies to the east.

rooms.name: A Turn in the Dark Hallway
rooms.description: This hallway bends from the north to the west.  The hall's black walls are rough and bumpy, and have no lantern or torchholders.  The air here is damp and somewhat warm, which makes the perfect environment for the red mold that grows all about.  The floor is mostly smoothed, but occasionally there are large protrusions, requiring care to avoid tripping.  To the south, a set of steel bars seperates the hall from what seems to be a jail cell.

rooms.name: A Dark Hallway
rooms.description: This hallway runs from the west to the east.  The hall's black walls are rough and bumpy, and have no lantern or torchholders.  The air here is damp and somewhat warm, which makes the perfect environment for the red mold that grows all about.  The floor is mostly smoothed, but occaisonally there are large protrusions, requiring care to avoid tripping.

rooms.name: A Turn in the Dark Hallway
rooms.description: This hallway bends from the north to the east.  The hall's black walls are rough and bumpy, and have no lantern or torchholders.  The air here is damp and somewhat warm, which makes the perfect environment for the red mold that grows all about.  The floor is mostly smoothed, but occasionally there are large protrusions, requiring care to avoid tripping.

West.description: A simple wooden door seperates this hallway from another room.

rooms.name: A Dark Hallway
rooms.description: This hallway runs from a staircase landing to the north, to the south.  The hall's black walls are rough and bumpy, and have no lantern or torchholders. The air here is damp and somewhat warm, which makes the perfect environment for the red mold that grows all about.  The floor is mostly smoothed, but occasionally there are large protrusions, requiring care to avoid tripping.

rooms.name: The Treasure Room
rooms.description: This room is in absolute chaos.  Bits of rock, parchment, and other debris are strewn about, although the reason for this is not readily apparent.  The room is decorated in gold trim about the walls.  A large marble platform in the center of the room has eyeball sized sapphires in a ring about the top.  A simple wooden door leads east.

East.description: A simple wooden door seperates this room from a hallway outside.

rooms.name: A Small Bedroom
rooms.description: This room is a small bedroom.  A pair of bunked beds sit against the northern wall of the room, the beds freshly made.  A rusty lantern on a desk near the southern wall gives off just enough light to ready comfortably while sitting at the desk.  A large archway to the east leads into another room.

West.description: A whitewashed wooden door is set in the west wall.

rooms.name: A Training Room
rooms.description: Dummies and other fighting aides are scattered about the room.  Hay from one of the most abused dummies lies in a small pile about the floor.  A large wooden block bears the wounds of many slashing blows.  Oddly, one of the targets on the wall seems to be scorched.  The bedroom lies through the arch to the west.

rooms.name: The Master Bedroom
rooms.description: This bedroom is quaint, but nicely furnished.  A large bed dominates the room, stacked high with furs for comfort.  A set of drawers next to the bed holds the more mundane posessions of the master of the tower.  A single lantern hung from the ceiling glows brightly, lighting the entire room.  The only exit is the door to the north.

rooms.name: A Steel Lined Room
rooms.description: The walls of this room are lined with brushed steel, which reflects the heat that radiates from below.  A metal ladder hangs near the western wall, leading down into the stifling heat.  The hazy image of a demon seems to float in the air here, but perhaps it is just the heat playing tricks.  A stone panel leads back to the main tunnel to the east.

East.description: A stone panel can be slid into the wall, allowing escape from this furnace.

rooms.name: Beneath the Ladder
rooms.description: The steel walls continue down to the bottom of this shaft.  At the bottom, the floor is stone, and quite warm at that.  The ladder hangs, barely within reach, leading back away from the heat.  Towards the bottom, the ladder is quite, quite hot to the touch, but still bearable for short periods of time. A hallway leads to the west.

rooms.name: A Scorched Hallway
rooms.description: The hallway here seems to be carved out of the natural rock, which here happens to be a dull gray stone.  To the west, black scorch marks line the northern wall of the tunnel, as well as part of the floor.  To the east, the steel walls of the shaft are still visible.

rooms.name: A Balancing Act
rooms.description: The ground here barely exists.  Square pillars not large enough to plant two feet on are the only floor here.  The pillars extend far down into a pit below. The pillars continue to the west, becoming more sparse, making it more difficult to cross safely.  The hallway continues to the west across the pillars, and east to solid ground.

rooms.name: A Balancing Act
rooms.description: The square pillars continue here, and although they are sparse, with a little effort they can be crossed.  The downside is, well.  The downside.  The pit extends far below into the darkness.  Alas, towards the middle, the floor is illusion.  The hallway itself continues to the east and west.

rooms.name: Amidst the Pillars
rooms.description: Pillars and air, pillars and air.  All that's about are pillars and air. The rock walls here are somewhat rippled, but overall smooth.  The bottom of this pit is now barely visible.

rooms.name: Amidst the Pillars
rooms.description: Pillars and air, pillars and air.  All that's about are pillars and air. The rock walls here are somewhat rippled, but overall smooth.  The bottom of this pit is now clearly visible below.

rooms.name: Amidst the Pillars
rooms.description: Pillars and air, pillars and air.  All that's about are pillars and air. The rock walls here are somewhat rippled, but overall smooth.  The bottom of this pit is looms below.

rooms.name: At the Base of the Pillars
rooms.description: The pillars fade out of existance here, completely illusionary.  The rippled walls provide little hope of climing up.  Being that this is the bottom of a deep pit, it seems odd that there is no debris, not even a fallen rock.  The only hope of escape is skyward, somehow.

rooms.name: A Balancing Act
rooms.description: The ground here barely exists.  Square pillars not large enough to plant two feet on are the only floor here.  The pillars extend far down into a pit below. The pillars continue to the east, becoming more sparse, making it more difficult to cross safely.  The hallway continues to the east across the pillars, and west to solid ground.

rooms.name: Before the Doors
rooms.description: Two monumental silver doors bar passage to the west.  The doors are polished to a high shine, and have a scene etched in black across them.  On the southern door, a lush meadow is depicted, next to a pond.  A beautiful woman lies in the meadow, staring at the clouds.  The pond extends across to the northern door, where the vegetation is sickly, and a man lies dead, blood flowing into a small pool.

North.description: The faint outline of a door is visible to the north.

West.description: The silver doors are quite ornate.

rooms.name: An Antechamber
rooms.description: A red carpet leads from the eastern doors to a large wooden desk near the center of the room.  The walls here seem impossibly far away, and yet tangibly near.  The black walls pulse, further causing disorientation.  Behind the desk sits a well cushioned, high-backed chair.

East.description: The silver doors are quite ornate.

rooms.name: A Grassy Plain on Another Plane
rooms.description: A plain extends to the east and south, covered in short, green grass.  To the north and west, the ground just stops looking down or out, all that is visible is blackness.  It is hard to tell if there's anything in the distance, or if there is, in fact, nothing.

rooms.name: A Grassy Plain on Another Plane
rooms.description: A plain extends to the west, east, and south, covered in short, green grass. To the north the ground just stops looking down or out, all that is visible is blackness.  It is hard to tell if there's anything in the distance, or if there is, in fact, nothing.

rooms.name: A Grassy Plain on Another Plane
rooms.description: A plain extends to the west and south, covered in short, green grass.  To the north and east, the ground just stops looking down or out, all that is visible is blackness.  It is hard to tell if there's anything in the distance, or if there is, in fact, nothing.

rooms.name: A Grassy Plain on Another Plane
rooms.description: A plain extends to the north, east, and south, covered in short, green grass.  To the west, the ground just stops looking down or out, all that is visible is blackness.  It is hard to tell if there's anything in the distance, or if there is, in fact, nothing.

rooms.name: The Center of a Grassy Plain
rooms.description: A plain extends in all directions, covered in short, green grass.  Farther in all directions, the plain just stops, ending in the blackness that surrounds the plain.  Directly above, a giant spheroid hangs above, shedding an eerie light about the area.

rooms.name: A Grassy Plain on Another Plain
rooms.description: A plain extends to the north, west, and south, covered in short, green grass.  To the east, the ground just stops looking down or out, all that is visible is blackness.  It is hard to tell if there's anything in the distance, or if there is, in fact, nothing.

rooms.name: A Grassy Plain on Another Plane
rooms.description: A plain extends to the north and east, covered in short, green grass.  To the south and west, the ground just stops looking down or out, all that is visible is blackness.  It is hard to tell if there's anything in the distance, or if there is, in fact, nothing.

rooms.name: A Grassy Plain on Another Plane
rooms.description: A plain extends to the north, west, and east, covered in short, green grass. To the south, the ground just stops looking down or out, all that is visible is blackness.  It is hard to tell if there's anything in the distance, or if there is, in fact, nothing.

rooms.name: A Grassy Plain on Another Plane
rooms.description: A plain extends to the west and north, covered in short, green grass.  To the south and east, the ground just stops looking down or out, all that is visible is blackness.  It is hard to tell if there's anything in the distance, or if there is, in fact, nothing.

rooms.name: Amidst the Void
rooms.description: The grassy plain is still visible, but there is no way to get back to it. The nothingness swirls, drawing the plain away.  Blackness is visible in all other directions swirling, twirling, nauseating.

rooms.name: An unfinished room
rooms.description: There are tall stone pillars to the east and west.  The remnants of an arch jut inward, but the floor (ceiling?) they once carried has long fallen.  A floor is a few feet below.

rooms.name: An unfinished room
rooms.description: You are in an unfinished room.
